MonsterTrait.Name: Ethereal Awareness
MonsterTrait.Text: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Hearing and Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The shadow mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shadow Blend
MonsterTrait.Text: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become invisible, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Weakness
MonsterTrait.Text: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
